content: It is possible that intelligent life in the universe could organize to work together in some symbiotic way to ensure the survival of ever-growing intelligent complexity. However, this is purely speculative and there is currently no scientific evidence to support this idea. Some scientists and philosophers have proposed that advanced intelligence in the universe may be cooperative and work together towards common goals, but this is purely speculative and there is no way to know for sure. Additionally, it is also possible that intelligent life in the universe may be in conflict with one another, or may be indifferent to the existence of other intelligent life.
